code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams,Link}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TeamDetail=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[team,setTeam]=useState(null);const[members,setMembers]=useState([]);const[projects,setProjects]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetchTeamDetails();},[id]);const fetchTeamDetails=async()=>{try{const teamResponse=await axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/api/teams/${id}`);setTeam(teamResponse.data);const membersResponse=await axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/api/teams/${id}/members`);setMembers(membersResponse.data);const projectsResponse=await axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/api/teams/${id}/projects`);setProjects(projectsResponse.data);setLoading(false);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching team details:',error);setLoading(false);}};if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading team details..."});if(!team)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Team not found"});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"team-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:team.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-4",children:team.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-2",children:"Team Members"}),members.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-disc pl-5 mb-4",children:members.map(member=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[member.name," - ",member.role]},member.id))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No members in this team yet."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-2",children:"Associated Projects"}),projects.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-disc pl-5 mb-4",children:projects.map(project=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/projects/${project.id}`,className:"text-blue-500",children:project.name})},project.id))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No projects associated with this team yet."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/teams/${id}/edit`,className:"bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded mr-2",children:"Edit Team"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/teams",className:"bg-gray-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded",children:"Back to Teams"})]})]});};export default TeamDetail;
